reasoning: Lactic acidosis complicating sepsis. Estimated incidence 10-20 per 100k based on ICU literature and sepsis surveillance data. High geographic variation due to healthcare infrastructure differences. Confidence moderate due to limited specific epidemiological registry data.
source: Angus DC et al. (2001). Epidemiology of severe sepsis in the United States. Crit Care Med. 29:1303-1310
